Perceptor::

"I'm on the way"said Perceptor by comlink to Wolfesntein"Give me your 
coordinates" After that, he leave the ship.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Wolfenstein::
> 
> Once again Wolfenstein punches button on a control board. The 
Warpstar un-cloaks and the cockpit opens. Wolfenstein steps out and 
waits for Perceptor.
